name: sidan-csl-rs
description: (De)serialization functions for the Cardano blockchain along with related utility functions

scripts.core:build-nodejs: (rimraf ./core/pkg && cd core; wasm-pack build --target=nodejs; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd core; wasm-pack pack) && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.core:build-browser: (rimraf ./core/pkg && cd core; wasm-pack build --target=browser; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd core; wasm-pack pack) && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.core:build-web: (rimraf ./core/pkg && cd core; wasm-pack build --target=web; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd core; wasm-pack pack) && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.core:build-asm: (rimraf ./core/pkg && cd core; wasm-pack build --target=browser; cd ..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd core; wasm-pack pack) && npm run asm:build && npm run js:flowgen
scripts.js:prepublish: npm run core:test && rimraf ./publish && cp -r ./core/pkg ./publish && cp README.md publish/ && cp LICENSE publish/
scripts.js:publish-nodejs: npm run core:build-nodejs && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -nodejs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-browser: npm run core:build-browser && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -browser && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-asm: npm run core:build-asm && npm run js:prepublish && node ./scripts/publish-helper -asmjs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:ts-json-gen: cd core/json-gen && cargo +stable run && cd ../.. && node ./scripts/run-json2ts.js && node ./scripts/json-ts-types.js

author: SIDAN Lab
